mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_b.category (title, `desc`, parentId, status, createTime) VALUES (#{title}, #{desc}, #{parentId}, #{status}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE db_b.category SET title = #{title}, `desc` = #{desc}, parentId = #{parentId}, status = #{status}, updateTime = now() WHERE category.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_b.category ORDER BY id
select * from db_b.category where parentId is null
select c1.title as firstLevelTitle, c2.id, c2.title from db_b.category c1 left outer join db_b.category c2 on c1.id = c2.parentId where c1.parentId is null
